description:

Creating a clean clear Camtasia 6 Screen and Audio Capture for Udemy!

In this course I will show you my methods for creating a good screen capture using Camtasia 6, this will include cleaning up noise and setting other options for a clearer audio track, directly within Camtasis 6.


We will also look at speed saving techniques such as using a template for your training course, creating call outs, looking at screen resolution and its impact on Udemy upload as well as using Pan and Zoom within Camtasia 6.


As a bonus we will look at seperating Audio from Video and then cleaning the exported Audio track up in Audacity (Udmeys preffered sound editor).

Here is the overview of what you will learn in Camtasia 6;

  • The impact of resolution on Camtasia to Udemy upload
  • How we can cope with a smaller resolution or work area
  • Tips on how to work with a larger resolution using Pan and Zoom
  • Creating Callout
  • Adjusting sound by adding noise reduction and levelling
  • Output for Udemy

Bonus sections

  • Splitting sound from video in Camtasia
  • Editing you sound files with Audacity
  • Combining sound and video back together
  • A quick tour of Camtasia 8 picking up on some of the techniques we learnt from the course, stay tuned for afull Camtasia 8 course soon :)
title: How to Use Camtasia to Develop Udemy Courses - Unofficial
